title: Royal Australian Survey Corps
brief_description: Shows the work of the men and women of the Australian Army Survey Corps in accurately mapping Australia and Pacific areas. Focuses on the important role of aerial photography, and the follow-up from the photographs - tracing copies and finally printing maps.
